revised_title: Detecting Time's Arrow: A Method for Identifying Nonlinear Dynamics in Time-Series Data
tldr: The authors present a method for detecting nonlinearity and deterministic chaos in time-series data. By using a nonlinear-prediction technique, they test for temporal directionality and identify whether erratic fluctuations in a time series are generated by a linear Gaussian process or involve nonlinear dynamics. The method is tested on various model and real ecological time series, providing insights into the presence of nonlinearity and chaos in these systems.
